body: You ferocity is quick but shorter lived.
name: Ferocious Action
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Orcs/New Racial Rules/Orc Feats/Ferocious Action

sections.body: When you fall to 0 hit points or fewer, you lose 2 hit points each round, but you are not staggered. If you are in a rage (such as that caused by the barbarian rage class feature), you instead only lose 1 hit point per round.
sections.name: Benefit
